update.description:
The changes:

* One minor feature was added to DSL to be able to provide default values to debbuild jobs
* One patch to support SOURCE\_TARBALL\_URI in other forms a part from bz2

The procedure to release would be:

* Create a [release in github](https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign_bridge/releases) using the procedure defined in that platform
* Use the [spawn\_changelog](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/default/release-repo-scripts/changelog_spawn.sh) tool on top of the [release repo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/ros1_ign_bridge-release) with the new version tag
* Run the [debbuild job](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros1_ign_bridge-debbuilder/) providing only the following parameters:

    * SOURCE\_TARBALL\_URI: the URI from github releases page with the code tarball
    * VERSION: new version tag \(without revision\)
    

Testing run and testing packages:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros1_ign_bridge-debbuilder&build=10)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros1\_ign\_bridge-debbuilder/10/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros1_ign_bridge-debbuilder/10/))
update.title: Support for ros1-ign-builder

content.raw: tested these changes with a fake build of the standard debbuild: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder\_no\_upload/3/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder_no_upload/3/) . No problems as far as I can see.
content.html: tested these changes with a fake build of the standard debbuild: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder_no_upload/3/ . No problems as far as I can see.
